sentences.en: a thoroughgoing revision of the text
sentences.cn: 对文本认真仔细的校订

sentences.en: At the final revision of the programme, three items were crowded out.
sentences.cn: 在最后修订节目单时, 三个节目被挤掉了.

sentences.en: I have got the revision of his dictionary.
sentences.cn: 我得到了他编的词典的修订本.

sentences.en: I know I haven’t done enough revision for tomorrow’s exam.
sentences.cn: 我知道我对明天的考试准备不足。

sentences.en: It is only because I am well on the forties -- a period of revision.
sentences.cn: 那只是因为我已经四十好几了 -- 已经到了会不断反省自己行为的年龄.

sentences.en: It is quite possible that the story presented here may require revision in the foreseeable future.
sentences.cn: 这里所做的论述在不远的将来会需要修正,这是完全可能的.

sentences.en: Large group workshop on Revision # 1 . Essay 2 discussed; theory handout.
sentences.cn: 修改作品 #.的大组讨论工作坊. 讨论文章2; 理论讲义.

sentences.en: Maintains accurate records and revision control for all document changes.
sentences.cn: 保持对文档数据的正确性及文档版本更新的控制.

sentences.en: Now each of these dogmas was undergoing revision.
sentences.cn: 现在,这些教条都在一一加以修正.

sentences.en: Revision is a fact of life in design.
sentences.cn: 修改并再修改,这是设计生活中的现实.

sentences.en: The dictionary is under examination and revision.
sentences.cn: 这部词典正在审订之中.

sentences.en: The electronic office will mean a revision of existing office procedures and job roles.
sentences.cn: 电子化高科技办公室意谓着现有的办公方式和角色的变更.

sentences.en: The first item on Wilson's reform schedule was tariff revision.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊立法表上列于首位的是修改关税.

sentences.en: The judge wants to see a revision of the procedures.
sentences.cn: 法官希望对程序进行修改。

sentences.en: The phase of writing that is actually most important is revision.
sentences.cn: 实际上写作过程中最重要的阶段是修改。

sentences.en: Then accordingly the paper proposes some revision suggestions on this provision.
sentences.cn: 据此笔者有针对性地提出了对该法条的一些修改建议.

words.tran_cn: 修改；校订；复习（revise的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 修订，修改，修订本，校对，复审，上诉
trans.tran_en: the work of studying facts again in order to learn them
